CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The solar cell devices fabricated from the copolymers and PC71BM exhibited high PCEs of 7.0% and 5.2% for PTATDPP and PTAFDPP , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| copolymers |
| PC71BM |
| PTATDPP |
| PTAFDPP |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| copolymers |
| PC71BM |
| PTATDPP |
| PTAFDPP |

These are the entities in the paragraph that can be identified as material names. The other entities in the paragraph, such as "solar cell devices" and "exhibited high PCEs," do not refer to specific materials and therefore are not included in the table.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The solar cell devices fabricated from the copolymers and PC71BM exhibited high PCEs of 7.0% and 5.2% for PTATDPP and PTAFDPP , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCEs (Power Conversion Efficiencies) |
| for PTATDPP and PTAFDPP solar cell devices |
| fabricated from copolymers and PC71BM |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCEs (Power Conversion Efficiencies) for PTATDPP and PTAFDPP solar cell devices |
| fabricated from copolymers and PC71BM |

Note: In this context, "solar cell devices fabricated from copolymers and PC71BM" can be considered a compound property that includes the material properties of the copolymers, PC71BM, and the resulting solar cells. However, since the focus is on the power conversion efficiencies, they are presented as separate properties in the table.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The solar cell devices fabricated from the copolymers and PC71BM exhibited high PCEs of 7.0% and 5.2% for PTATDPP and PTAFDPP , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PCEs for PTATDPP: 7.0% |
| PCEs for PTAFDPP: 5.2% |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PCEs for PTATDPP: 7.0% |
| PCEs for PTAFDPP: 5.2% |

These entities clearly refer to the "Property Value" of the solar cell devices fabricated from copolymers PTATDPP and PTAFDPP, respectively, in terms of their Power Conversion Efficiency (PCE).
